name: BIOMETRIC
description: Upgrade your security system with our professional biometric service and installation. Our expert team specializes in providing secure and convenient access control solutions using biometric technology. The Biometric Access Control System secures, monitors the attendance control system professionally which predominantly uses the fingerprint as the method of authentication to grant the access. The fingerprint access system has been profoundly implemented in many areas which are strictly meant for providing security. The F18 series of fingerprint access system: VITS offers F18 Finger Print Access Control System, which accommodates the fastest commercial-based fingerprint matching algorithm with the following add-ons. The device comes with the following features: The fingerprint has built-in capability with the fastest and concern accurate algorithms which can diagnose the fingerprint recognition in 1 sec, capacity to store 3000 finger print templates and accommodate 30,000 transactions. VITS have been extensively using the Wiegand interface for both input and output which extensively used for the access control system and also provides network interface for TCP/IP or RS485. The device comes with easy operation and the maneuvering features with built in 4X4 keypads, doorbell, built-in USB port which allows manual data transfer. The device seamlessly connects to the web-server, built-in interface for the 3rd party electric lock, door sensor, exit button and alarm VITS in Hyderabad, successfully able to secure, monitor and then completely administer the client’s facility with a professional biometric access control system service for various corporate organizations and the business establishments in large. VITS offers complete range of biometric services for various business enterprises that are keenly looking forward for the biometric access control systems, which aims to provide high security. These Biometric Services ensure that only the authorized personnel are able to enter into their work premises. Further, these access controls could even generate the daily reports, integration of the attendance tracker, payroll systems and plenty of other features. VITS offering unmatched biometric based attendance system VITS range of biometric based attendance system brings about the seamless solutions for the attendance system. VITS has always been very pro-active in bringing about the best of the technology in collaborating the biometric services to generate attendance reports of the employees to the HR team. VITS takes Biometric Services towards securing the Data Centers Data Center has been a facility, which maintains the computer system’s specific components such as the data storage and associated components. They manage the database of multiple clients’ data, since they handle the crucial data, these data centers have to be meticulously handled so as to avoid any illicit access. VITS have played a key role in securing these data centers with its range of biometric services. VITS as the pioneers in securing the manufacturing companies through biometric services using the RFID Technology VITS has been successfully providing security solutions to the manufacturing companies. They secure the research & development (R& D) laboratories through the use of RFID technology. VITS has been an industry leader in ensuring the security and the maintenance for the manufacturing companies; we implement the RFID technology in the manufacturing company so that through RFID’s entire manufacturing plant is secured. VITS has a robust biometric access control system towards the fingerprint attendance system and GPS Tracking. It has always been a challenge for the companies to monitor the employee’s attendance and reporting structure constantly. The intention in having a biometric finger-printing attendance system and GPS tracking system has always benefitted the companies in having the attendance of the employees at the site locations and GPS tracking system to properly track the employees, further enabling to assess the real-time location. VITS has played a key role in providing the excellent tracking facility through their robust biometric services and the meticulous GPS Tracking system.

name: Structured Cabling
description: Structured Cabling constitutes a set of network cables which are used to connect the plethora of network supported devices, in order to transfer the data and related information through switched, routers, data storage, IP phones and other network products. The structured cabling has become must for organizations, which constantly looks for seamless connectivity across the offices. VITS have been offering the premium structured cabling services in Hyderabad. In the case of large enterprise, the structured cabling becomes more crucial component which seamlessly connects with multiple network devices, ensuring that the communication stream is meticulously maintained. We have always been well-known and a reputed brand which offers the comprehensive range of network services for the large enterprises in Hyderabad. We are acknowledged in the market as one of the structured cabling companies in Hyderabad, integrating the best practices towards the network solutions. We have been extensively offering the structural cabling service in Hyderabad includes the following: Twisted Pair Cabling Fiber Optic Cabling The twisted pair cabling has been predominantly used as pivotal network cabling across the various industry landscapes across Hyderabad. We boost the exhaustive technical team, who are experts in the structured cabling specifically onto the Twisted Pair cabling and the Fiber Optic Cabling The technical team accomplishes the complete analysis of your premises and brings about the service plan for the implementation of the cabling solutions. VITS completely understand the specific mandates of the customer with reference to the premises where the structured cabling would be implemented; we always work keeping the budget constraints of the customer and execute the implementation of the structured cabling by seeking the appropriate approvals from the customer from time to time. The satisfaction of our esteemed clients has always been a testimony for the execution of our work We have always been ahead and unique with reference to our technical pursuit. Our technical experts understand the client’s needs and perform the initial assessment through specific methods and implementation begins with concise planning, sketching and integrating and then the maintenance is to be carried out by them. We ensure to provide the best network accessories to the client without compromising on the quality. Maintaining the quality standards is our motto, which profoundly categorizes us among the peers in the market. Further, these products are always standardized with the inclusion of warranty. We offer varieties of integrated cabling systems, we undertake quality control and output tests for each equipment. Our services are competitive in the market. VITS offers the integrated structured cabling installation services which include: Structured cabling installation Installation of copper and fiber optic cable Installation of air-blown fiber systems (eABF) Installation of wiring racks, cabinets and patch panels. Our expertized teams are always available to undertake the structured cabling services in Hyderabad. We understand that issues can arise at any time, which is why we offer 24/7 instant support to ensure that your business operations remain uninterrupted. Our dedicated support team is available round-the-clock to assist you with any technical or service-related queries.

name: Network Storage and Backup Solutions
description: In order to adapt to the evolving market dynamics, business apps, databases and emails need them in so many different ways. Therefore, in the digital universe that is evolving around us, storage integration is even more important. Ensure the safety and accessibility of your data with our comprehensive network storage and backup solutions. Our expert team specializes in designing, implementing, and maintaining storage and backup systems that meet your business needs.

services.name: Network-Attached Storage (NAS):
services.desc: We offer NAS solutions that provide centralized storage accessible to multiple users and devices over a network.

services.name: Storage Area Network (SAN):
services.desc: Our SAN solutions deliver high-performance storage that is ideal for demanding applications and large-scale storage requirements.

services.name: Cloud Backup:
services.desc: We provide secure cloud backup solutions that offer off-site storage for your critical data, ensuring its safety in case of on-site disasters.

services.name: Data Deduplication:
services.desc: Our data deduplication services help reduce storage costs by eliminating redundant data and optimizing storage capacity.

services.name: Backup Monitoring and Managemen:
services.desc: We offer backup monitoring and management services to ensure that your backups are performed regularly and successfully.

Extras.name: Expertise
Extras.desc: With years of experience in the industry, our team has the knowledge and skills to design and implement storage and backup solutions that meet your business requirements.

Extras.name: Security
Extras.desc: We prioritize the security of your data, implementing industry best practices to protect your information from unauthorized access and data loss.

Extras.name: Reliability
Extras.desc: Our solutions are designed for reliability, ensuring that your data is always available when you need it.

Extras.name: Scalability
Extras.desc: We offer scalable solutions that can grow with your business, allowing you to easily expand your storage and backup capabilities as needed.

Extras.name: Customer Satisfaction
Extras.desc: Your satisfaction is our top priority, and we strive to deliver solutions that exceed your expectations.

GetInTouch: Protect your data with our network storage and backup solutions. Contact us today for a consultation and quote.
